projects.name: Super Rainbow Reef
projects.description: OOP game where the user attempts to bounce a star back to the blocks. The user wins whenever the blocks are gone. The user can also collect power ups. Developed in Java, using OOP concepts.

projects.name: Library Full Stack App
projects.description: A react/express application that allows the user to add, delete, update courses. Additional features include sign in, sign out and sign up. This project was created to combine all knowledge learned from express REST API and React. This is the 10th project from the Treehouse TechDegree.
